Pre-Game Insights: The Braves will be without their top starting pitcher Chris Sale, who is out for the Wild Card Series against the San Diego Padres due to back issues.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Braves will reassess Sale's status if they advance to the Division Series.
The Braves will need to bring up a pitcher from the Triple-A roster to take Sale's spot against the Padres.
Others: Chris Sale has dealt with back issues periodically all season, though the issue became more problematic after his most recent start, a five-inning stint against Cincinnati on Sept. 19.
